value.title: RI instance size flexibility & reservations for Azure Cosmos DB, SQL DB, and SUSE | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Yashesvi Sharma joins Scott Hanselman to discuss reserved virtual machine instances and how the reservation you buy can apply to other virtual machines (VMs) sizes in the same size series group.
